Key Match Events: Travis d’Arnaud hit a walk-off home run in the ninth inning
Reynaldo López pitched six strong innings and lowered his season ERA to 2.00
Pre-Game Insights: The Braves' magic number is one to clinch their seventh straight playoff appearance
The Braves have a makeup doubleheader set for Monday against the Mets
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Brian Snitker expressed excitement over the playoff push
Travis d’Arnaud praised the pitchers for keeping them in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals went with a makeshift lineup due to injuries
Freddy Fermin and Garrett Hampson had back-to-back singles in the third inning
